reviewText: This movie is definitely a low budget, indie film so if you're looking for Hollywood quality - prepare for a disappointment!  But what you are going to get from this movie is a fun romp from someone who clearly likes to make movies.  Effects are done on the cheap and there are some actually pretty good effects for what they're working with.  Also, the cast is clearly having fun and enjoying themselves - they are engaged and playing up their characters without camping it up too much.  Support independent artists who are working hard to create content to entertain you!
I adore this movie. James is hilarious.

Rich (James Balsamo) sells comic books and has trouble with women as can be expected. When the demon Az (Billy Walsh) comes along looking for a soul, Rich's life picks up. The film is low budget punk. There is little continuity in the feature, mostly short scenes strung along. The scenes are hit and miss, with more on the miss side. The zombies come in near the end and are light on decent zombie effects.

Parental Guide: F-bomb, sex, ample nudity.
This was a real treat to watch. The quality was real good and the acting was actually quite impressive. I would recommend this movie!
Exceeded all expectation and the some, being  a huge Tom Savini fan this movie was one I was really looking foward to watching.

Acid Bath has done it again ! Get this for sure !! The guys in the bar playing pool were awesome !! I think they are a New York based Metal band named KILLJOY but I'm not sure. Anyway pick this one up, you won't be disappointed !
